title: Skin
lyrics:
I'm done fighting
I was losing
I kept discovering the chance of you
And what I'd give to live that second again
Just a chance to feel that skin

Feel that skin

Feel that skin

Feel that skin



Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me



Memories replaying

Like a movie

If I could recite the words to you

And what I'd give to live that second again



Just a chance to feel that skin

Feel that skin

Feel that skin

Feel that skin



Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me

Oh you left me
